
integers(?Vars)

   Vars' domain is the integer numbers.

Arguments
   Vars                Variable or integer, or a list or submatrix of variables/integers

Type
   library(ic)

Description

   Constrain the variables to integer values.  Note that this declaration is
   implicit when specifiying an integer interval, e.g. in Y :: 0..99.


See Also
   reals / 1, suspend : integers / 1, fd : integers / 1, eplex : integers / 1, ic_kernel : integers / 1, bfs : integers / 1
